# l06


## 1

```markdown
Example

Hapke's

\[
\frac{\cos \Theta_i}{\cos \Theta_e}
\]

R(p, q)?

\[
\cos \Theta_i = \hat{n} \cdot \hat{s}
\]

\[
\cos \Theta_e = \hat{n} \cdot \hat{v}
\]

\[
\hat{v} = \hat{z}
\]

\[
\hat{n} = \frac{(-p, -q, 1)^T}{\sqrt{1 + p^2 + q^2}}
\]

Thus \(\hat{n} \cdot \hat{v} = \frac{1}{\sqrt{1 + p^2 + q^2}}\)

\[
R(p, q) = \frac{1 + p \rho + q \eta}{\sqrt{1 + \rho^2 + \eta^2}}
\]

\[
R = cI_e \Rightarrow R^2 I_s = I_r + \beta p + q \cdot q
\]

Get the shape of the surface?

We only have the surface reflectance map.
2 unknowns, 1 measurement (p, q)
